title: Rainbow Diary
material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
brief_description: Hand-drawn directly onto 16mm film, this animation is a ‘diary’ of daily drawing-on-film practice by Ivor Cantrill over a period of 18 months. Drawing style ranges from bold geometric patterns, to a delicate calligraphy.
